Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Gun = Tool.Handle
local Missile = Instance.new('Part') Missile.FormFactor = 3 Missile.Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.25, 2) Missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Pastel Blue') --Missile.CanCollide = false
local FloatForce = Instance.new('BodyForce') FloatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Missile:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) FloatForce.Parent = Missile
local MissileVelocity = 190.0
local Character local Player local Mouse
Tool.Enabled = true
local PullingPart = false
local MissileDamage = 25 local Debris = Game:GetService('Debris')
local function WeldParts(p0, p1) if p1:FindFirstChild('HarpoonWeld') then return end
local weld = Instance.new('Weld') weld.Name = 'HarpoonWeld' weld.Part0 = p0 weld.Part1 = p1 weld.C1 = p1.CFrame * p0.CFrame:inverse() weld.Parent = p1
return weld end
local function PullPart(hPart, laser, weld) PullingPart = true print('Pulling part', hPart, hPart.Parent, hPart:GetMass(), hPart.Anchored) local velocity = 75.0 if hPart and hPart.Parent and hPart:GetMass() < 20 and hPart.Anchored == false then if hPart.Parent and hPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then velocity = 125.0 end if hPart.Name ~= 'Head' and hPart.Name ~= 'Torso' then hPart:BreakJoints() if hPart.Parent and hPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then hPart = hPart:Clone() hPart.CanCollide = true hPart.Parent = Game.Workspace
Debris:AddItem(hPart, 4.0) end end hPart.Velocity = (Torso.Position - hPart.Position).unit * velocity if laser then local duration = 0.0 while (Gun.Position - hPart.Position).magnitude > 10 and duration < 2.0 and PullingPart do local distance = (Gun.Position - hPart.Position).magnitude laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(Gun.Position, hPart.Position) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -distance/2) laser.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, distance + 0.2) duration = duration + wait() wait() end laser:Destroy() end else print('Destroying laser', laser) if laser then laser:Destroy() end end print(PullingPart) PullingPart = false wait(1.5) if weld then weld:Destroy() end end
local function Pierce(hPart, missile, laser) print('Piercing', hPart, missile, laser) if hPart and hPart.Parent and missile and missile.Parent and hPart.Name ~= 'HarpoonLaser' and hPart ~= Gun and hPart.Parent ~= Character then local humanoid = hPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(MissileDamage) end print('Welding') local weld = WeldParts(hPart, missile) PullPart(hPart, laser, weld) end end
function FireBeam(beamStart, beamEnd) local distance = (beamStart - beamEnd).magnitude if distance > 150 then distance = 150 end
local laser = Instance.new("Part") laser.Name = "HarpoonLaser" laser.Anchored = true laser.CanCollide = false laser.Shape = "Block" laser.formFactor = "Custom" laser.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, distance + 0.2) laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic laser.Locked = true laser.TopSurface = 0 laser.BottomSurface = 0 laser.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(beamEnd, beamStart) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -distance/2) laser.Parent = game.Workspace
return laser end
local function ShootHarpoon(target) local target = target or Mouse.Hit.p
local missile = Missile:Clone() missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(Torso.CFrame.p + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 4.0, target) missile.Transparency = 1.0 local sPos = Gun.Position missile.Velocity = (target - missile.CFrame.p).unit * MissileVelocity missile.Parent = Game.Workspace print('Spawning missile') local laser = FireBeam(sPos, target) missile.Touched:connect(function(hPart) Pierce(hPart, missile, laser) end) Debris:AddItem(missile, 4.0) end
local function OnActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
if not Torso or not Humanoid then return end
if PullingPart then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
Spawn(function() ShootHarpoon() end)
wait(1)
Tool.Enabled = true end
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid')
PullingPart = false
Mouse = Player:GetMouse() end
local function OnUnequipped() PullingPart = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)
